at.fhooe.mcm.it.adid.controller.activities.deployment

Class DeploymentQuestion2Fragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      • at.fhooe.mcm.it.adid.controller.activities.deployment.DeploymentQuestion2Fragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentCallbacks, TextToSpeech.OnInitListener, View.OnCreateContextMenuListener

    public class DeploymentQuestion2Fragment
extends Fragment
implements TextToSpeech.OnInitListener
    This contains one section of Deployment. Level 2 of the Deployment phase involves answering the question . Here the feature of voice input is implemented
    Author:
    Shrikant Havale

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void checkTextToSpeechInstalled()
      This method checks for the TTS component is installed or not, if not disables the button

      This method checks if the Voice recognition feature is installed on mobile device
      private int checkWithCorrectAnswer()
      correct answer is stored in options file of question at the end of file, so last options in list is our answer
      private void disableRadioOptions()
      Radio Options are to be disabled once the question is answered , not allowing him to answer again, unless he resets the settings
